data.message:
Tomorrow is National Prayer Day!🙏🏻
I ask for all to put their political views aside and pray for our fellow Texans who have lost everything, some lost family, all have been effected mentally.  The disease, the mosquito virus, respiratory, mold & others that are on the way. Please pray for them, pray for our President and leaders to make good decisions and lead with compassion.  Pray for the first responders and the massive volunteers. Pray we all band together and do the right thing for the victims of Hurricane Harvey. 
God Bless! 🙏🏻🇨🇱🙏🏻🇨🇱🙏🏻🇨🇱🙏🏻
